text:
: The Southern Railway will operate special fare special trains between Chennai Egmore and Tirunelveli to clear the extra summer rush as per the following schedule: Train No.06003 Chennai Egmore – Tirunelveli special fare special train will leave Chennai Egmore at 9.05 p.m. on April 1 and 22 and reach Tirunelveli at 10.45 a.m. the next day. In the return direction, Train No. 06002 Tirunelveli - Chennai Egmore special fare special train will leave Tirunelveli at 2.45 p.m. on April 3 and 24 and reach Chennai Egmore at 4.15 a.m.the next day.

The trains will have one AC 2-tier, two AC 3-tier, 12 sleeper class and two luggage-cum-brake van coaches. The trains will stop at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Vridhachalam, Tiruchi, Dindigul, Kodaikkanal Road, Madurai, Virudhunagar, Sattur, Kovilpatti and Vanchi Maniyachchi. Train No.06002 will also stop at Mambalam. Advance reservations for the above trains are open.

Vendor development programme

The Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association would conduct a vendor development programme at its office at Ariyamanglam in the city on March 30. S.Punniyamoorthy, secretary, TIDITSSIA, in a press release, said the programme would highlight opportunities for vendors in Railways and Defence and also credit schemes offered by banks. Government officers and bankers would brief participants. Those looking for new opportunities and aspiring entrepreneurs could participate in the programme. Those who are interested have to register their names with the TIDITSSIA office on payment of Rs.300 as registration fee. For more details, dial 0431-2440119 or 2440114 or email:tiditssiatry@gmail.comortiditssiatry@yahoo.com
title: Special trains
